Title: The Judas Goat
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Christine Boylan, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah
Plot: With Frank in bad shape, Micro calls on Curtis for help. Madani and Russo continue to mix business with pleasure. Lewis stands up for his rights.
